description: Try our easy to follow Deep-Fried Brussels Sprouts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried vegetable,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Deep-Fried Brussels Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Trim sprout bases and halve lengthways. Heat enough oil in a deep pan over medium-high heat. Cooking sprouts in batches, carefully lower in oil and cook for 4-5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Drain in a bowl lined with paper towel and season while warm. Repeat with remaining sprouts. Serve with sour cream and sauce.
